Sentencas: The application of a power-quality control center (PQCC) to provide an unbundled quality of electricity supply is examined.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: The center consists of back-to-back power converters, a dc bus and a solid-oxide fuel-cell distributed generator (SOFCDG).
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: The purpose is to use the flexibility offered by the converters and SOFCDG to realize varied levels of ac supply quality to the loads.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: Through the concept of a feasible operating area of the SOFCDG, analysis shows that the ability of the PQCC to accommodate instantaneous power demand change is constrained.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: This is due to limits imposed on the fuel utilization factor of the SOFCDG.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: A feasible PQCC operating scheme is then proposed.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: It fully exploits the ability of the converters and the distributed generator to respond to external disturbances.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: In the event of a system voltage disturbance, the PQCC is to operate in one of two scenarios in accordance to the severity of the disturbance.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: Based on the dynamic model derived for the power network, a design procedure of the PQCC control system is also described.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply

Sentencas: Simulation results show the efficacy of the proposed scheme.
Titulo: The design of a fuel-cell-based power-quality control center to realize unbundled power-quality supply
